jobs.description: Verify order length of metal in Epics, confirm die profile to work order, Verify cut tolerance.
Operation of an overhead crane to move and gather dies, Check tool stack for proper sizes.
Assist in the operation of stacking equipment from the cold saws. Verify part lengths meet order expectations.
Receive instructions and work orders for the job from machine operator, Plan details of working procedure and gather tools and materials required.
Ensures operation of machinery and mechanical equipment by completing preventive maintenance requirements on engines, motors, pneumatic tools, conveyor systems, and production machines
Transport all supplies and/or finished materials throughout departments, Load and unloads trailers with raw and finished materials
Coordinate with customer sales representatives and production departments to prepare and schedule shipments to our customers nation wide
